description: Special plants from the Boin Archipelago that can be weaponized. Heracles begins teaching Usopp about these plants during his training.

users.notes: Begins learning about Pop Greens in episode 515, masters them during the two-year timeskip

keyMoments.description: Heracles begins teaching Usopp about Pop Greens and their combat applications.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction to the weapon system that will become central to Usopp's post-timeskip fighting style.

strengths: Various types for different tactical situations
weaknesses: Requires knowledge and skill to use effectively
significance: Pop Greens become Usopp's primary weapon system after the timeskip, significantly enhancing his combat capabilities and allowing him to hold his own in the New World.
